title: Update LIC Plans section with 6 real plans using uploaded marketing images and trilingual content

quotes: 6 LIC Plans with complete details extracted from your 9 uploaded images

acceptanceCriteria: All 6 plans are displayed in the LIC Plans section
Each plan shows correct plan number where applicable

requirements.text: Extract and structure detailed plan information from uploaded images for Jivan Labh: 10 year payment term, 6 year income period, 16 year maturity, premium tables showing coverage from ₹2.1 lakh to ₹12.1 lakh with daily, monthly, and full payment options

acceptanceCriteria: Plan data includes payment term (10 years), income period (6 years), maturity period (16 years)
Premium table data is structured with daily, monthly, full payment, maturity at 16 years, pure benefit, and coverage amount columns

requirements.text: Extract and structure detailed plan information from uploaded images for Jivan Umang: Save ₹138 daily for 15 years to get lifetime ₹50,000 annual pension, ₹52 lakh on maturity, ₹22 lakh for family, with guaranteed bonus structure and natural risk cover of ₹5.4 lakh and accidental risk cover of ₹22 lakh

quotes: Jivan Umang - Save ₹138 daily for 15 years → Get lifetime ₹50,000 annual pension + ₹52 lakh on maturity + ₹22 lakh for family

Risk cover details include natural risk (₹5.4 lakh) and accidental risk (₹22 lakh)

quotes: Jivan Shanti (Plan 850) - Single premium annuity plan with guaranteed rates table (entry ages 30-75, deferment periods 0-20 years with rates 6.49% to 21.60%)

acceptanceCriteria: Plan data includes complete guaranteed rates table with entry ages (30, 40, 50, 60, 65, 70, 75)

requirements.text: Extract and structure detailed plan information from uploaded images for Jivan Utsav: 10% guaranteed returns plan with example of saving ₹5,000/month for 11 years to get ₹60,000 annually from year 14 onwards, including comprehensive benefit tables showing 5-year payment periods with guaranteed annual income ranging from ₹50,000 to ₹10,00,000

quotes: Jivan Utsav (Plan 771) - 10% guaranteed returns, save ₹5,000/month for 11 years → Get ₹60,000 annually from year 14 onwards

acceptanceCriteria: Plan data includes payment period (10 years for premium), income start (year 13/14)

requirements.text: Extract and structure detailed plan information from uploaded images for Jivan Lakshya: Target-oriented life goal plan with entry age 18-50 years, policy maturity 13-25 years, premium payment age 13-25 years, hospitalization benefits from policy start, with example showing ₹5 lakh coverage for 30-year-old with ₹23,105 annual premium (₹1,966 monthly), 50,000 annual returns building to ₹13,75,000 maturity with 110% coverage sum plus bonuses and final additional bonuses

quotes: Jivan Lakshya - Target-oriented goal plan (Entry age: 18-50 years, Policy maturity: 13-25 years). Example: ₹5 lakh coverage for 30-year-old with ₹23,105/year premium

acceptanceCriteria: Plan data includes entry age range (18-50 years), policy maturity range (13-25 years), premium payment period (13-25 years)
Hospitalization benefits start from policy inception (3 years minimum)
Example calculation structured with timeline showing annual returns of 50,000 building toward maturity amount
Maturity benefit formula includes sum assured (coverage amount) plus bonuses plus final additional bonuses (110% of policy maturity amount)
Two uploaded images provide visual timeline illustration and detailed Marathi text specifications

requirements.text: Extract and structure detailed plan information from uploaded images for Bima Laxmi: Women-focused 25-year money back plan (Plan 881) with ₹10 lakh coverage providing ₹75,000 returns every 2 years, ₹5 lakh after premium term completion, ₹5 lakh bonus at policy maturity, ensuring both security and savings for women

quotes: Bima Laxmi (Plan 881) - Women's plan: ₹10 lakh coverage → ₹75,000 returns every 2 years

acceptanceCriteria: Plan data specifies 25-year policy term
Money back schedule shows ₹75,000 returns every 2 years during policy term
Benefits structured to show ₹5 lakh after premium term and ₹5 lakh bonus at maturity

requirements.text: Implement trilingual content support (Marathi, Hindi, English) with a language toggle switch for the LIC Plans section, extracting Marathi/Hindi text from uploaded images and providing English translations for all plan details

quotes: Trilingual content - Marathi, Hindi, and English with seamless language toggle
Extract and display the exact text from your images alongside English translations

acceptanceCriteria: Language toggle switch allows users to select between Marathi, Hindi, and English
Plan titles, descriptions, benefits, and all textual content display in selected language
Marathi/Hindi content matches text from uploaded images
English translations are accurate and professional for insurance terminology

requirements.text: Design each plan card with a summary view showing key highlights (plan name with number, coverage amounts, premium ranges, policy terms, key benefits) and implement expandable 'View Full Details' sections containing all detailed premium tables, maturity calculations, eligibility criteria, and annuity rate schedules extracted from uploaded images

quotes: Summary cards with key highlights (coverage, premiums, benefits)
Expandable 'View Full Details' sections containing all premium tables, maturity calculations, eligibility criteria, and annuity rates from your images

acceptanceCriteria: Each plan card displays summary information in collapsed state: plan name with number, primary coverage amount, premium range, policy term duration, 2-3 key benefits
'View Full Details' button toggles expansion to show comprehensive tables

Expanded view includes all data from uploaded images: complete premium tables with all columns and rows, maturity benefit calculations, eligibility criteria (age ranges, payment terms), guaranteed rates or return schedules
Tables are responsive and maintain readability on mobile devices
Expansion/collapse animation is smooth and intuitive

requirements.text: Create a responsive grid layout for displaying all 6 plan cards that adapts to different screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop) while maintaining visual consistency and professional presentation
